resources.string: Answer 10 questions and learn how much you know about Android! Here we go!
The quiz contains open questions as well as single and multiple choice answers
The result you will be able to post on social networking sites or send in private messages.
Before start the quiz, please fill out the form below. These data will be used to generate the final message.
x a b r d h c a
Question 1: Which unit should we use to resize the text?
Question 2: Which of the following variables can be use for store a value: 2.33
Question 3: What view will allow you to scroll screen content?
Question 4: Which of following views are view groups?
Question 5: What method do you use for checking if checkbox is marked?
